SQL.statement: CREATE TABLESPACE grape PAGESIZE 4 K MANAGED BY automatic storage
CREATE LARGE TABLESPACE banana MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'banana1' 50000, FILE 'banana2' 50000, FILE 'banana3' 50000)
CREATE LARGE TABLESPACE fan MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'fan1' 5000, FILE 'fan2' 5000, FILE 'fan3' 5000, FILE 'fan4' 5000, FILE 'fan5' 5000)
CREATE TABLE MU( IndexKey1 Integer not null, IndexKey2 Char(20) not null, VCHAR20 VARCHAR(20), LVCHAR VARCHAR(300), BLOB30 BLOB(1g) logged) IN grape Index in fan LONG IN banana value compression
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX MU ON MU (IndexKey1, IndexKey2 DeSC)
CREATE INDEX INX1 ON MU(IndexKey2 Asc)
CREATE TABLE MUDCC( IndexKey1 Integer not null, IndexKey2 Char(20) not null, VCHAR20 VARCHAR(20), LVCHAR VARCHAR(300), BLOB30 BLOB(1g) logged) IN grape Index in fan LONG IN banana
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX MUDCC ON MUDCC (IndexKey1, IndexKey2 DeSC)
create index IndexKey2Index on mudcc (IndexKey2 ) minpctused 20
CREATE TABLE MUDCCB( IndexKey1 Integer not null, IndexKey2 Char(20) not null, VCHAR20 VARCHAR(20), LVCHAR VARCHAR(300), BLOB30 BLOB(1g) logged) IN grape Index in fan LONG IN banana
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX MUDCCB ON MUDCCB (IndexKey1, IndexKey2 DeSC)
create index indx2 on mudccb (vchar20 desc ) allow reverse scans
ALTER TABLE MU COMPRESS YES Static
ALTER TABLE MUDCC COMPRESS YES Static
ALTER TABLE MUDCCB COMPRESS YES Static
Alter table MUDCC Data Capture Changes include Longvar columns
Alter table MUDCCB Data Capture Changes
